trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Newport Beach
There were no other sightings in Newport Beach on or around September 22nd 2005
Summary: flying beacon of wide light, made some spiral loops leaving glowing trail faded from sight over ocean
divs: Sighting Detailsdining with friends in Laguna beach. Friend called & said go outside & look in the sky. I thought ufo. Flying beacon of light, looping then flew off over the ocean. Interesting & want to know what it was. it faded from sight all most suddenly over the ocean.
